p.codeblock: public virtual void OnRtmpStreamingStateChanged(string channelId, string url, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE state, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_ERROR errCode)

section.p: When the CDN live streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the current state and the reason why the state has changed. When exceptions occur, you can troubleshoot issues by referring to the detailed error descriptions in the error code parameter.
